h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Gold Sun Crow Location
content: The Gold Sun Crow can be found in the secret Purple Cloud Mountain area of The Webbed Hollow. It is in a chest up a log which you can climb up to reach a rock high above the area.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Gold_Sun_Crow.md', within the main section titled 'Gold Sun Crow', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Gold Sun Crow Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Gold Sun Crow can be found in the secret Purple Cloud Mountain area of The Webbed Hollow. It is in a chest up a log which you can climb up to reach a rock high above the area.
